description.name: GameCP
description.short: The next-generation game server management platform. Built for performance, security, and ease of use.
description.long:
GameCP is the next-generation control panel designed for reliability, performance, and scale.

* Automatic Server Provisioning
* One-Click Game Installation
* Real-Time Metrics & Monitoring
* Single Sign-On Integration
* Multi-Node Support
* 50+ Supported Games
* File Manager & RCON Console
* Automatic Backups

[Learn more »](https://gamecp.com)
